extensions
Class Hierarchy

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  extensions.Hierarchy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Hierarchy
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Generic hierarchy class Contains all of the elements that are required for a hierarchy in the display This allows multiple hierarchy's to be added easily with all of the elements Also a change can be easily made for all hierarchies

Version:
5.4
Author:
Anthony Scata
See Also:
Serialized Form

expand_collapse_decision

public void expand_collapse_decision(AMLabel original_label,
                                     AMLabel comparison_label,
                                     boolean entry,
                                     boolean hover,
                                     boolean is_left_up)
Decide the action to be performed on this label We are concern here with expanding and collapsing, nothing else Also want to change the image according to the action This is generic and works for all levels and panel

Parameters:
original_label - - the label that the interaction occurred on
comparison_label - - the label that we are comparing to
entry - - if we are expanding or not
hover- - if it was a hover or a click
is_left_up - - if the event was caused by a left and up motion

isBottom

public boolean isBottom(AMLabel label)
Check to see if this label is at the bottom of the vis by checking it against the max levels

Returns:
- true if the label is at the bottom, false it isn't

setDimensions

public void setDimensions(java.awt.Dimension screenSize)
Set the dimensions of some part of the hierarchy

Parameters:
screenSize - - assumed to be the size of the view above, this way we don't paint components bigger than that
